title: Nike Football: Whatever It Takes - Episode One

asset.author: Nike
asset.hookText:
For Tom Rogic, the Nike Chance was over long ago. Now at Celtic FC it's time for Tom to focus on becoming a first team regular.

This is Whatever It Takes, Episode One.

Follow the Whatever It Takes series and find out how you can join the Nike Chance here:

http://go.nike.com/NikeChance
http://www.Facebook.com/nikefootball
http://www.Twitter.com/nikefootball
